net.varkhan.base.containers.array
Class BitArrays

java.lang.Object
  net.varkhan.base.containers.array.BitArrays

public class BitArrays
extends java.lang.Object

Static bit manipulation utilities.

Utilities for manipulating integer types as bit arrays, and performing conversions between representations.

Method Detail

flip

public static long flip(long mask,
                        boolean[] flags)
Flip the bits of a bit mask according to the values to a boolean array.

Parameters:
mask - the original bit mask
flags - the boolean array
Returns:
a bit mask whose bits are flipped compared to mask iff the corresponding boolean is true

flip

public static boolean[] flip(boolean[] flags,
                             long mask)
Flip the values of a boolean array according to the bits of a bit mask.

Parameters:
flags - the original boolean array
mask - the bit mask
Returns:
a boolean array whose values are flipped if the corresponding bit is set

mp2

public static short mp2(byte val)
Multiplex an integer value 2-fold.

Parameters:
val - the integer
Returns:
the integer whose bit in position 2*k is the bit in position k in the argument, and whose bit in position 2*k+1 is 0

mp2

public static int mp2(short val)
Multiplex an integer value 2-fold.

Parameters:
val - the integer
Returns:
the integer whose bit in position 2*k is the bit in position k in the argument, and whose bit in position 2*k+1 is 0

mp2

public static long mp2(int val)
Multiplex an integer value 2-fold.

Parameters:
val - the integer
Returns:
the integer whose bit in position 2*k is the bit in position k in the argument, and whose bit in position 2*k+1 is 0

rev

public static byte rev(byte val)
Reverses the bits of an integer value.

Parameters:
val - the integer
Returns:
the N-bits integer whose bit in position N-k is the bit in position k in the argument
